channel.title: 2024-02 on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2024-02 on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 10 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description: Sloshing water in your mouth, just before you go to bed, helps trigger cleansing receptors that clean your brain off nightmares. Said nobody wise and scientific. But if my five year old trusts it religiously and does it every night, it’s a lie worth telling. Just like contact lenses help see your bones.
item.content:encoded: Sloshing water in your mouth, just before you go to bed, helps trigger cleansing receptors that clean your brain off nightmares. Said nobody wise and scientific. But if my five year old trusts it religiously and does it every night, it’s a lie worth telling. Just like contact lenses help see your bones.

item.title: 05 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description: A friend led a whisky tasting session last night. The Mexican Prieto Y Prieta was terrific. Even better though was spending some great time with a group of guys with such different backgrounds!
item.content:encoded: A friend led a whisky tasting session last night. The Mexican Prieto Y Prieta was terrific. Even better though was spending some great time with a group of guys with such different backgrounds!

item.title: 03 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description:
Setup a Linkding instance on the Moose for better managing my bookmarks. Not a huge fan of the name but it’s a great lightweight app doing just what it’s built for.

The HTTP Shortcuts app on FDroid is a decent partner app to share bookmarks from the phone.
item.content:encoded:
Setup a Linkding instance on the Moose for better managing my bookmarks. Not a huge fan of the name but it’s a great lightweight app doing just what it’s built for.

The HTTP Shortcuts app on FDroid is a decent partner app to share bookmarks from the phone.

item.title: 03 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description: Infyblogs and the internal BB were a great place to hang out! Over the last couple decades, haven’t quite  found a thriving network that is anywhere similar to those channels. Thinking of it, my foray into Linux was solely due to InfyLUG! Wonder if they still have those running!
item.content:encoded: Infyblogs and the internal BB were a great place to hang out! Over the last couple decades, haven’t quite  found a thriving network that is anywhere similar to those channels. Thinking of it, my foray into Linux was solely due to InfyLUG! Wonder if they still have those running!

item.title: 03 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description: After last weekends’ hike, I threw my back out doing something super mundane. Had to take a day off work just to let it heal out. Tiny muscles I didn’t know existed were screaming out. If anything, it made me realise how incredibly complex our bodies are and a subtle reminder to strengthen the core.
item.content:encoded: After last weekends’ hike, I threw my back out doing something super mundane. Had to take a day off work just to let it heal out. Tiny muscles I didn’t know existed were screaming out. If anything, it made me realise how incredibly complex our bodies are and a subtle reminder to strengthen the core.
